products.name: SATLUJ
products.description:
Composition: Ferrous Sulphate(Fe) - 19%
Speciality of Satluj (Ferrous Sulphate 19%):
High Purity: Satluj is 100% pure and free from impurities, ensuring consistent and effective performance.
High Concentration: Contains 19% Ferrous (Fe), making it a powerful source of iron for crops.
Maximum Dryness: With 98% dry formulation, Satluj offers superior shelf stability and free-flowing texture.
Moisture Resistant: When stored in a dry place, it retains its dryness and quality without caking or lumping.
Assured Quality: Manufactured under stringent quality controls to deliver premium-grade micronutrient fertilizer.
Efficient Iron Supplement: Quickly addresses iron deficiencies in crops, promoting healthy chlorophyll formation and greener, more vigorous plants.
Best Used In: Wheat, Paddy, Maize, Barley, Gram, Lentil, Moong, Urd, Mustard, Groundnut, Soybean, Sunflower, Potato, Tomato, Brinjal, Okra, Cabbage, Cauliflower, Onion, Garlic, Peas, Citrus, Pomegranate, Banana, Grapes, Apple, Guava, Papaya, Cotton, Sugarcane, Tea, Coffee, Flowers, Medicinal Plants, Aromatic Plants, Turf, Lawns.
Supports: Ferrous sulphate 19% (FeSO4) provides vital support to crops by correcting iron deficiencies, boosting photosynthesis, and promoting overall plant health. It acts as a micronutrient fertilizer, ensuring efficient chlorophyll production and enhancing nutrient uptake, ultimately leading to increased crop yield and resilience to environmental stresses.
Dose/Acre: 10-20 kg / acre
Packaging Options: 10 kg

products.name: BLACK HORSE
products.description:
Composition: Organic Fertilizer & Minerals.
Specialities of Black Horse:
Dual Power of Organics & Minerals – Combines the richness of organic matter with essential mineral nutrients for complete crop nourishment.
Boosts Soil Fertility – Enhances soil texture, microbial activity, and nutrient-holding capacity for long-lasting fertility.
Improves Plant Immunity – Builds stronger resistance against abiotic stress like drought, salinity, and temperature fluctuations.
Enhances Root & Shoot Growth – Promotes vigorous development from roots to canopy, ensuring healthy vegetative growth.
Safe & Sustainable – 100% eco-friendly and safe for crops, soil, farmers, and the environment.
Better Yield & Quality – Helps in producing higher yields with improved quality of fruits, grains, and vegetables.
Suitable for All Crops – Wheat, Paddy, Maize, Barley, Gram, Lentil, Soybean, Mustard, Groundnut, Cotton, Sugarcane, Potato, Tomato, Brinjal, Chili, Okra, Onion, Garlic, Cabbage, Cauliflower, Peas, Apple, Grapes, Pomegranate, Mango, Guava, Papaya, Citrus, Strawberry, Tea, Coffee, Flowers, Medicinal Plants, etc
Supports: Black Horse enhances soil fertility, boosts root development, and promotes overall plant vigor for healthier growth and higher yield.
Dose/Acre: 200 gm- 1kg / acre
Packaging Options: 500 gm, 1 kg

products.name: ROOT RAJA
products.description:
Composition: Mycorrhiza 
Specialities of Root Raja :
100% Water-Soluble: Ensures quick and complete absorption by plants for immediate effectiveness.
Granular Formulation: Easy to apply and highly effective in soil application; ideal for uniform distribution.
Enhances Nutrient Mobilization: Facilitates efficient mobilization and transfer of vital nutrients like Phosphorous, Nitrogen, Sulphur, Potassium, and essential micro-nutrients such as Zinc, Copper, Manganese, and Iron.
Improves Drought Resistance: Boosts the plant's natural ability to withstand water stress, ensuring healthier growth in challenging conditions.
Broad Crop Compatibility: Suitable for use in all types of crops including cereals, pulses, vegetables, fruits, and horticultural plants.
Compatible with Bio-Fertilizers: Can be safely used in combination with other biological soil enhancers for better results.
Soil Health Promoter: Encourages microbial activity in the soil, enriching soil fertility and sustainability.
Best Used In: Grapes, Wheat, Okra, Cotton, Guava, Tea, Tomato, Medicinal Plants, Onion, Paddy, Apple, Banana, Barley, Brinjal, Flowers, Sugarcane, Strawberry, Ginger, Papaya, Sugarbeet, Cabbage, Cauliflower, Sorghum, Capsicum, Coffee, Citrus, Oil Seeds, Maize, Lentil, Gram, Peas, Mung, Pomegranate, Beans, etc.
Supports: Mycorrhizae, a symbiotic relationship between fungi and plant roots, helps plants by enhancing nutrient and water uptake, improving soil structure, and increasing resistance to diseases and environmental stresses.
Dose/Acre: 4-8 kg / acre
Packaging Options: 4 kg

products.name: DUMBELL
products.description:
Technical Name: Azoxystrobin 18.2% + Difenoconazole 11.4% SC 
Best Used In: Paddy, Tomato, Chilli, Wheat, Mango, Pea. 
Defends Against: Leaf spots, Blights, Powdery mildew, Rusts, Downy mildew, Anthracnose, Early and late blight 
Dose/Acre: 200 ml / acre
Packaging Options: 250 ml, 500 ml, 1 ltr

products.name: SPEXS
products.description:
Technical Name: Azoxystrobin 11% + Tebuconazole 18.3% w/w SC
Best Used In: Onion, Rice, Wheat , Potato, Chilli, Tomato
Defends Against: Yellow Rust, Sheath Blight, Early Blight, Late Blight, Anthracnose, Alternaria Leaf Spot, Scab (in apples), Downy Mildew, Powdery Mildew, Fruit Rot, Die Back
Dose/Acre: 300 ml / acre
Packaging Options: 250 ml, 500 ml, 1 ltr

products.name: FOX
products.description:
Technical Name: FIPRONIL 0.6% GR
Best Used In: Paddy, Sugarcane, Wheat
Defends Against: Stem Borer, Leaf folder, Twemite, Early Shoot Borer
Dose/Acre: 4 kg / acre
Packaging Options: 4 kg

products.name: SOMA
products.description:
Technical Name: Cartap Hydrochloride 4% GR
Best Used In: Paddy
Defends Against: Leaf folder, Stem borer, Whorl maggot
Dose/Acre: 7.5 - 10 kg per acre
Packaging Options: 5 kg

products.name: EXAM-PRO
products.description:
Technical Name: Thiamethoxam 30% FS
Best Used In: Paddy, Wheat, Cotton, Vegetables, Maize, Sunflower
Defends Against: Aphids, Whiteflies, Jassids, Shoot Fly, Termites, Thrips, Stem Fly
Dose/Acre: This product is ideal for seed treatment at a dosage of 1.5 ml to 4 ml per kg of seed, depending on the crop. It can also be used as a foliar spray at 100 ml per acre for effective protection and enhanced crop performance.
Packaging Options: 100 ml, 250 ml, 500 ml, 1 ltr.

products.name: BLENDER
products.description:
Technical Name: Bifenthrin 10%EC
Best Used In: Paddy, Cotton, Sugarcane, Corn, Some Vegetables
Defends Against: Different types of insects like ants, termites, aphids, beetles, cockroaches, and spiders.
Dose/Acre: Recommended dosage ranges from 200 ml to 400 ml per acre, depending on the crop type and disease severity.
Packaging Options: 250 ml, 500 ml, 1 ltr.

products.name: KIWI
products.description:
Contains: Organic Component Derived From Ascophyllum Nodosum Saeweed Extract From Auastralia, Potassium Humate, Amino Acid And Other Micronutrients.
Description: KIWI is a scientifically formulated plant growth enhancer designed to support vigorous vegetative development and improve the overall health of crops. It effectively minimizes flower drop, encourages uniform flowering and fruiting, and helps deliver consistent, high-quality yields. With its balanced action, KIWI contributes to better crop performance and enhanced productivity across a variety of crops.
Features & Advantages of KIWI:
100% Water-Soluble Formulation
Crafted with a fully water-soluble composition, KIWI is enriched with natural bio-boosters including seaweed extract, humic acid, and a balanced blend of essential macro and micronutrients for optimal plant nourishment.
Balanced Nutrient Supply
Provides well-rounded nutrition across all stages of plant growth, with a special focus on the early vegetative and branching phases to establish a strong crop foundation.
Stress Resistance & Recovery
Encourages healthy white root formation and strengthens plant resilience. Helps crops bounce back quickly from biotic and abiotic stress, while enhancing natural immunity.
Yield Enhancement & Quality Boost
Promotes freshness, improves stomatal function, and supports strong petiole development—leading to better blossom retention, fruit set, and ultimately, higher yield and superior crop quality.
Suitable For:
All types of crops including vegetables, fruits, cereals, pulses, and plantation crops.
Recommended Application Dosage
Per Hectare Usage:
Apply 650-800 ml per / acre, depending on the crop stage and crop type.
Stage-Wise Foliar Dosage:
Vegetative Stage: Use 1-1.5 ml per litre of water
Flowering Stage: Use 2-3 ml per litre of water
Fruiting Stage: Use 3-4 ml per litre of water
Packaging Options: 250 ml, 500 ml, 1 ltr
